pictures = #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Books set User_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pictures = #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
